translations: 回收利用；改造（reclaim 的过去分词）；开垦土地

sentences.sentence: One such partnership is with Elvis&Kresse, an accessories brand working with reclaimed materials.
sentences.translation: 其中一个合作伙伴是 Elvis&Kresse，一个使用再生材料的配件品牌。

sentences.sentence: The team reclaimed the title from their rivals.
sentences.translation: 这个队从对手手中夺回了冠军。

sentences.sentence: The site for the airport will be reclaimed from the swamp.
sentences.translation: 这片湿地将会被开发来建机场。
